main event: A crew from a B-47 bomber reported sighting a blinking pinkish-red object in the sky over Alaska on 12 December 1954.
interesting points: The object changed color from blinking pinkish-red to steady white during the sighting,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes before the object dissipated with daylight,Initially thought to be a fighter-type aircraft, it was later presumed to be a celestial body or reflection,The object was observed from a B-47 at an altitude of 30,000 feet,The sighting occurred in the vicinity of 71-00N 156-20W.
